channel.title: [317] HellFirePK {ALLSTAR}
channel.description:
[URL=http://imgur.com/nsxWnCY][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nsxWnCY.gif[/img][/URL]
I am making a 317 PK server with the Allstar Base.
Features: The server will probobly become a webclient but for now it's a client with download.
The server is pk and might become a spawn server in the near future. Until then the devoloper and I will think of the idea of making the server a chat based theme. Where you can talk to other players through the server with a mic in or out of the computer :D
Credits: Base: Mod Allstar (90% for the base) Developer: Mod Cody (GodexCAB) (5% for developing the server) Me: GordonBandos (5% for being Owner) (:
*I will post more pictures. I don't have any right now because I just started making the server today.*

The server will probobly become a webclient but for now it’s a client with download.
